oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. A.K Shelton letter, July 1, 1922. 2 of 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from A.K. Shelton, Prison Physician, Petros, TN, to Mrs. L.C. French, July 1, 1922. 2 of 2. Re: support of Harry Hannah for office, women's importance in elections, University of Tennessee's relationship with Harry Hannah. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Politicians; Political elections; Women's rights;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: A.K. Shelton
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
